Articles.Content:
I glue 8 of these with separators on top of a lifter and park in a 240K orbit. When I need to rescue someone I decouple one and do the deed.

The 48-7S and those 3 tanks make 1300 dV. That's enough for a rendezvous, deorbit and landing at KSP with fuel to spare.

The light and PB-NUK are because I always seem to end up doing the rescue in Kerbin's shadow.

Cost 5342 funds each.

Anyone got cheaper?

(Just spotted that 3300 funds is for the PB-UK! I'll play with a battery and see if that will do instead).

Edited July 25, 2014 by Foxster

This does pretty much the same job for 2502 funds (and has 1500 dV)...

Swapping out the three Oscar-Bs for an FL-T100 brings the price down to F2212 and ups the dV to 2979 if you are really watching the pennies and/or need the dV but the aesthetics don't quite do it for me

Edited July 25, 2014 by Foxster
These are very nice Foxster, thanks for sharing
just launched ten of these into orbit...thanks for the idea! I was previously using a Mk 1, FL-T100, and a LV909...these should be MUCH better!
